title: Yocto build failure: Mono 5.18.1.0 cannot build msbuild 16.0 from current xplat-master
body:
### Steps to reproduce

1. Set up a Yocto based build environment e.g. via https://github.com/Angstrom-distribution/angstrom-manifest, use the genericx86 or genericx86-64  machine type for building software.

2. Add the meta-mono layer from the below repository to this custom OS:

https://github.com/zboszor/meta-mono
branch: add-msbuild-16-WIP

3. Run these commands:

bitbake mono-native
bitbake -c compile msbuild-native

### Expected  behavior

msbuild should be built correctly.

### Actual behavior

msbuild fails with errors. The actual error depends on the command line switches to the build script or extra patches.

With the basic setup, i.e. running "make" the command extracted from the msbuild Makefile in the msbuild recipe, this error occurs:
```
$ bitbake -c compile msbuild-native
...
```
